channel.title: Self updating launcher
channel.description: I think it would be a good idea to have the launcher be able to check for updates for its own firmware, and download and install them itself. A lot of softwares do this, and it would alleviate future "Help me update" topics when the axoloti is released.

item.title: Self updating launcher
item.dc:creator: @johannes johannes
item.description:
@johannes wrote:

The firmware version is 1.0.0.1 in the 1.0.3 software release if I recall correctly.
Don't worry, you'd get a warning when firmware does not match software version.

Auto-downloading and installing software updates is pain.
I think much easier and nearer in future is an "update available notification".
